div.p: Miss Ellen Smith
111 Hatton Street
Jackson
Tenn
Camp Meade Maryland
Dear Ellen -
Well as I am at last settled for a few days I will write you.
How is ever thing in Jackson? Fine and dandy I hope.
Sure is cold here so you had better be glad you are not here.
The ground is covered with ice and I cant hardly stand up
You should see me all dressed up in this soldier suit it is so tight I cant stoop over but I guess I will get alright some if these days
I dont know how long will be here, about a month though. I guess I will have to go to rifle range in about 2 weeks

but will come back after about 10 days out there. I will tell you the truth I dont think murch of this army life. But I know of lots of things I dont like that I have to stand But some day I am coming back to dear old Jackson to stay and wonder if you will still be there I hope so any way.

Wee what is doing in the city now? Do they still have dances at the Moose Hall. Do you ever go I talk like I had been gone for a year and I tell you it seems that way to me but it hasnt been but 9 days but I have had lots of experience in that time
And some thing I was about to forget you should see these shoes I have on the kind I wore when I was a kid on the farm
They have nails in the soles and would weigh at lest 10 pounds

but after all they keep the cold out They call them trench shoes so I guess they want them to last until I go over the pond I expect I will be over there in the spring that is what ever body seems to think around here. Well what is Ester doing? has she married yet and say did cusin Everett get through with his bad luck poor boy I believe I had rather be a soldier that a married man
How is Mr and Mrs Hood. well all the neighbors Sure would like to be home Xmas but I know there is no chance so you just think of me and that will help some
Well I guess I had better ring off for this time Answer real soon and tell me ever thing you know that is good for I am anxious to here all the news
Address me
James L. Dodds
23 Engineers Recruting Detachment
Camp Meade Md.
